about_the_game:
Description:
Dive into the relentless action of Defender, a thrilling roguelike wave-based game where your survival depends on your skill and strategy. Face off against hordes of basic monsters, formidable elites, and fearsome bosses. Navigate the battlefield with WASD controls, and unleash your attacks with precision using your mouse. Each wave completed grants you the chance to level up, enhancing your character's abilities and preparing you for even more challenging foes. Will you rise to the top and become the ultimate monster slayer?

Features:

  • Intense wave-based combat
  • Variety of enemies including basic monsters, elites, and bosses
  • WASD movement and mouse-based attacks
  • Progressive leveling system
  • Dynamic and engaging gameplay

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Defenders | Wave Survival Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Face endless waves of monsters in Defenders, a thrilling roguelike game. Use WASD to move and the mouse to attack, battling basic monsters, elites, and bosses. Level up your character after each wave to enhance your abilities and survive the onslaught.
